answers.answer: I am not aware of these meds causing progressive myopia or glaucoma.  The PDR lists blurry vision as one of the side effects of almost every medication in that reference.  Progressive myopia is usually an inherited condition, but can also be caused by diabetes and nuclear cataracts.  I would see an ophthalmologist for a complete exam.  You need treatment for the glaucoma to prevent permanent loss of vision, so do not neglect this.
